get_rightsizing_recommendations:
SELECT a.*
  FROM [Turbonomic].[vw_VM_Scale_Advice] a
      INNER JOIN [AZURE].[VMs] vm
      ON vm.subname = a.account
      AND vm.resourcegroup = a.resourcegroup
      AND vm.name = a.[name]
  WHERE
      JSON_VALUE(vm.tags, '$.environment') IN (?)
      AND JSON_VALUE(vm.tags, '$.humana-resource-id') = ?
get_cost_summary:
SELECT Environment, SUM(Cost) AS TotalCost
  FROM [FinOps].[CostBreakdown]
  WHERE BillingPeriod = ?
  GROUP BY Environment
get_idle_vms:
SELECT Name, ResourceGroup, Subscription, AvgCPU
  FROM [FinOps].[VM_Usage]
  WHERE AvgCPU < 5
